title: 'Awesome Mix' Is No. 1 On Billboard 200 Album Chart
teaser: The soundtrack for Marvel's blockbuster space opera Guardians of the Galaxy is No. 1 for the second week in a row. Nielsen SoundScan reports the compilation sold 93,000 copies last week.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
